attributes.comment:
I want to say as forcefully as I can that I believe raising the fees again is wrong. Americans are
generous people. Many, many more Americans would adopt if it were only affordable. With an
overseas adoption we can offer opportunities and hope that simply is unavailable to these orphans
any other way. The point should be getting the children placed into loving homes. Many families
can afford to RAISE a child, they cannot afford to ADOPT a child. It's time for governments, both
here and abroad, to stop getting in the way of this important, deep, and deeply humane process.
Help by not only keeping fees steady, but dropping them in order to enable more
Americans to reach out with their hands, their hearts and their lives.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Liz Rosenberg
